tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE infrastructure_damage_status_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  damage_location VARCHAR(255),
  damage_description TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE InfrastructureDamageReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    damage_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    reported_by VARCHAR(100),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE RepairDecisions (
    decision_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    repair_type VARCHAR(50),
    decision_date DATE,
    decision_maker VARCHAR(100),
    CONSTRAINT fk_report_id FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES InfrastructureDamageReports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InfrastructureDamageReports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  damage_type VARCHAR(50),
  damage_description TEXT,
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE StatusUpdates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  updated_status VARCHAR(50),
  updated_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES InfrastructureDamageReports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RepairRequests (
  request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  repair_type VARCHAR(50),
  repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  request_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES InfrastructureDamageReports(report_id)
)

CREATE TABLE DecisionMakingLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  decision_notes TEXT,
  decision_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DamageReports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  damage_type VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);
